observations.text: Why isn't there a bear leg at this bull leg's origin?

Can you explain how this gets created with 10% branch ratio? It's parent has a root at 4798. The longest counter leg there is 225.75 pts. This leg starts at 4791. The best counter leg could have been from 4779. So a 12 pt rally. This is way less than 22.5. So this leg should not get created. What am I missing?
What was this legs biggest counter trend?
What is the counter trend for this leg? I'm wondering why it was preserved over others here?
Why isn't this engulfed pruned already?
